titles.main: Make your contribution to Ukrainian culture

main.title: Make your contribution to Ukrainian culture
main.ogTitle: Make your contribution to Ukrainian culture
main.ogDescription: A project to get acquainted with the destroyed cultural monuments of Ukraine and raise funds for their reconstruction.
main.maintext: The russians have already destroyed 400 architectural sights, but they cannot demolish Ukrainian Culture!

show.1: I have shown you only 2 out of more than

main.mapText: Check our map to see them all
main.donateText: Please, donate any sum for their renewal
main.otherHelp: how to help in other ways?

popup.text: We are very grateful for your desire to help rebuild Ukraine's cultural heritage.

goals.raise1: Every donation will help save Ukrainian culture during the war and restore it once we win!
goals.raise2: We will generate a report of income and expenses on our site every month.
goals.raise3: We are prepared to conduct personal meetings with benefactors who donate more than $100.
goals.raise4: The donation made by the benefactor is non-refundable. In case of non-implementation of the project or availability of balances, the funds will be transferred to the official account of the Ministry of Culture of Ukraine.
goals.text1: Our Foundation is called upon to finance the restoration of destroyed architectural sites.
goals.text2: Yet, it is still dangerous to conduct such work until the end of the active phase of this war because of possible missile strikes.
goals.text3: During the war, our Foundation is focused on financing the following goals:

goals.1: Information coverage of russia's crimes against the Ukrainian cultural heritage
goals.2: Support of Ukrainian museums in deoccupied regions
goals.3: Transportation or conservation of museum artifacts

notready.1: A little more and the possibility of paying by card will be added!
notready.2: You can now donate with PayPal or cryptocurrency.

goals.noCurr: Currently, it's not possible to make a donation to this foreign currency account. But this option will be available soon.

text.1: Charity Foundation “SaveArtUA” announces the fundraiser of UAH 60,000 for the needs of the Galagan Art Museum (Chernihiv) to ensure the safe storage of museum exhibits.
text.2: You can read more about the museum and see the budget below.

cookie.text: We use cookies to personalize your experience. By continuing to visit this website you agree to our use of cookies

donatePopup.help: Help us to save Ukrainian culture

home.title: Ukraine Interactive Map
home.subtitle: SaveArtUA is covering war crimes against cultural heritage in Ukraine on live map
home.100: Monuments are in critical conditions right now

goal.1: Spreading information about war crimes against culture

home.teamText: Our team consists of proactive people from different parts of Ukraine. They are saving Ukrainian culture.
